A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are some plot lines that were turned on their side\, and some people won't love that\, but I did. I respected it so much for doing something different with so much of this. Great performances and great overall story. The fact that the Fore is sort of redefined here in a sense will bother some\, but this is a grand source of energy\, a mystical religion/way of life...you don't get to decide exactly how it works. Sorry. Rose is great\, and I really enjoyed her as an addition. Rey and Luke and Leia are spectacular. Kylo Ren is hugely improved here. So a flawed film\, but very good.
